name: Cubetrix (qqepijack)
description:
Cubetrix, made for the GeoJam. Theme: The Other Side.

In this game you control a cube and try to reach the goal by jumping from block to block and avoid falling into emptiness. Blocks are divided in two different dimensions and you have to enter the right dimension to see where is it safe to jump. Some blocks are neutral and can be seen in both dimension.

Move - AD

Jump - W

E - Enter other dimension

Credits:

"Music by Karl Casey @ White Bat Audio"
